name: astro-photosuite
description: GLightbox-driven lightbox integration for Astro Markdown images.

scripts.build: sass src/styles/glightbox.scss dist/glightbox.css --no-source-map --style=compressed && sass src/styles/image-alts.scss dist/image-alts.css --no-source-map --style=compressed && tsup src/photosuite.ts --format esm --dts --out-dir dist --minify && node scripts/postcompress.mjs
